## Effect interface

Represents a class for handling side effects on dispatched action(s). Provided with token [STORE\_EFFECTS](./state-management.store_effects.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Effect<TAction extends StateAction> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [onErrorAction?](./state-management.effect.onerroraction.md) | (err: unknown) =&gt; Immutable&lt;[StateAction](./state-management.stateaction.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| void | <i>(Optional)</i> If set, this action is dispatched if any errors occur in the action observer |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [handle$(actions$)](./state-management.effect.handle_.md) | A handler function that listens to the action observer. |
